articles.title: ‘Dungeons & Dragons’ Documentary in the Works at Hasbro - Hollywood Reporter

articles.author: Lucas Manfredi
articles.title: Disney hikes prices for California theme park tickets, Genie+ - Fox Business
articles.description: Disneyland's one-day tickets will range between $104 and $179. Genie+ will increase to $25 per day from $20 when booked in advance and vary based on the day when purchased at the park.
articles.content:
Guests visiting Disney's California theme parks will now have to dole out more money.
According to the House of Mouse's new pricing, one-day tickets in Tiers 1-6 will now cost between $114 to $179 d… [+3317 chars]
